name: Iceberg Ice Cubes
description: Infuse flavour and customize large, slow-melting ice cubes with ease. Great for elevating water to stay hydrated, and for cocktails too!

ingredients.name: mixed berries or sliced citrus fruit

preparation: Pour freshly boiled water over Epicure Tea. Steep for 5 minutes, strain, and cool.
Divide your chosen fruit between the 6 cubes of Epicure Iceberg Mold.
Gently pour prepared Tea evenly into each individual mold. Freeze for at least 4 hours.
